General.Name: Yolo SA
General.Description: BluGo S.A., a technology company, operates in the electromobility industry. It operates franchise network of charging points for electric cars. The company was formerly known as YOLO S.A. and changed its name to BluGo S.A. in May 2022. BluGo S.A. was founded in 1998 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

0.Name: Mr. Krzysztof  Piwonski
0.Title: Co-Founder and Pres of Management Board
